title: ChEMBL Bioactivity
description: A large-scale database of bioactive molecules with drug-like properties. Includes compound structures, targets, and activity data extracted from literature and patents.
use: QSAR modeling, virtual screening, AI-based drug design.

title: MetaCyc Pathways
description: Curated database of experimentally elucidated metabolic pathways and enzymes, spanning thousands of organisms. All entries are literature-supported and cross-linked to gene and protein databases.
use: Metabolic modeling, biochemical pathway AI reasoning.

title: MassBank
description: Comprehensive repository of reference mass spectra for small molecules. Used for spectral matching and compound identification in metabolomics and sonification models.
use: Spectral AI models, sonification training, metabolite identification.
